content: Janam: - balaheenarum paapikallumaaya nyangallude mel anugrahangallum karunayum randulokangallilum ennumennekkum choriyappedumaaraakaname. Aammeen,

/Turakkamillaattha unarvullllavanaaya ente kartthaave! Ninte unarvvine sthothram cheyyuvaanaayittu paapamuzhukalil ninnu nyangallude urakkatthe unartthaname. Maranamillaattha jeevanullllavane! Ninte karunaye vandippaanaayi maranavum naashavumaakunna urakkatthil ninnu nyangallude maranatthe nee jeevippikkaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddharoohaayume! Svargatthilum bhoomiyilum sthuthikkappettavanum vaazhtthappettavanum nee aakayaal ninne sthuthikkunnavaraaya svargeeyamaalaakhamaarude mahatthvamulllla vrndangallodorumichu vishuddhiyodukoodi ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum ninne sthuthichu vaazhtthuvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Aammeen.

Lokam rakshippaa-nekan suthanavathaaram cheyyumpoll
/tmaathaavaayu kanyamariyaamine ette-
Nnoru lekhanamezhuthi thaathan vittaan doothane nasaretthil.

/Tnyangallude kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Uttharamarullicheythu nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

Mohana sundaranaamangall
Nalki poorvvikaneethijnyar
Kanyaka daaveedin-makall mariyaaminnaay.
'poottiya vaathili'thennevam haskkeeyelothi
'poottiya thottamadachorutte'nnevam shlemoon:
/t'puri ennevam daaveedum;
/tjaathikalle poshippippaan
Vitthillaathe mullachoru nal
Sasyam thaan mashihaanaathhan;
Thal smrthi maanichaan - oozhiyilum melum.

Praarththhichaalum saubhaagyavathee praarththhichaalum
nin praarththhanayaal naathhan punyam nalkeedatte.

Kanyakamariyaam praarththhikkumpolleerayanetthi
Daivatthaale preshithamaakum shlommo nalki.

Shlommo chonnitteritheemayanaam doothan chonnaan
Kanyaathvatthil nee aathmajane prasavicheedum.

shobhaapoornne! Pedikkendaa thaathan ninnil
Preethippettaanekasuthan than maathaavaakkaan.

Inneram nee vismayamerum garbham peri
Shaashvatharaajyam vaazhum prajaye prasavicheedum.

Ompathu maasam ninne ettoll than praarththhanayaal
Daivaathmajane! Kopatthin dandozhivaakkenam.

Sahadaa, kaadeesha-nmaare! Lokasahaayatthi-nnuravaayu
/tveeryam ningall than asthhikkaayu thannon
/tdhanyan; naathhangkal ningall nyangallkkaayu praarththhikkenam.

/Tnyangallude kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Uttharamarullicheythu nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

Sathyatthe snehichore!
Puthranu vendi marichore!
Satthamare! Vaazh/u200bvom ningall thannormma.
Anuthaapamezhum paapikall than thuramukhamaayu ningall.
Ningallilamarum mashihaayaam naathhanodarththhippin.
/tthannaagamanadine krpayum
/tvaazh/u200bvum nyangallkkarulleedaan.
Daivikapeedhatthin mumpil
Mukhathejassodee nyangall
Raapakalennennum sthothram paadeedum.

Haa! Bahumohana naadatthaal
Evangelyonil naathhan
Kalppichaan priyaraam uthsaahikallodaay:
Aathmadaridranmaar dhanyar svarppuramaarjikkum,
Vilapichamarunnor dhanyar nedidumaashvaasam.
/tpeedaardditharum dhanyanmaar;
/thatharaam sahaderum dhanyar;
Peedaykkum yaathanakallkkum
Prathiphalamaayivaraarjikkum
Svargatthodoppam shaashvathamaam jeevan.

Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Ninnadiyaar than praarththhanayaal.

Nin vrtthaantam roohaayaal
Chonnoraam nibi shleehanmaar,
Snehaal mrtharaam sahadenmaar
Praarththhikkum, krpa cheyyenam.

Kartthaavinnishdam cheythor
Nirmmalare! Praarththhichiduvin,
Nyangallil ninnum neengeedaan
Kopatthinnadiyum dandum

Kartthaave krpa cheyyaname
Ninnadiyaar than praarththhanayaal;
Nyangallkkum mrtharaayorkkum
Paapavimochanamekenam.

Kartthaave! Nalkaashvaasam nin salbhavanangallkkullllil
/tvaangippoyorkkaayu krpayee nyangallkkum
Adiyaarkkumavarkkum pattum kuttangall maatteedenam.

/Tnyangallude kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Krpayundaayi nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Uttharamarullicheythu nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Nyangallude kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

uththhaanatthin naallollam
Thaathkkaalikamaamee jeevan
Vitta pithaakkallkkum bhraathrjanangallkkum
Kaantiyezhunnarakallkkullllil nalkeedaashvaasam;
Avare orkkum naall kabarullllasthhikallariyenam
/tnin kalpana manmayaraamaa-
/tdaamyarkkuyirekeedumpoll
Kaanti aninyittavar ninno-
Doppam manavarayil pooki
Uyirekum ninne sthothram cheyyenam.

Aarkkaayu kaazhchakallivideyanay-
Kkunno bhaagyamavannettam
Mel svargatthilavannormmayathundaakum.
Gothrapperukallormmaykkaayu kartthaavin mumpil
Kaanmaan kallukallil mooshaa kotthiyathorkkumpoll
/tningall than mrtharperukalle
/torkkaanum, palllliyilivide
Ezhuthaanum, melsvargatthil
Mashihaathan varavil thanno-
Davar modippaanum cherppin pristhaayil.

Ninnil nidrayada-nyaagamanam kaakkum
Mrtharil shaantiyana-chekuka parihaaram

Nin abhaye mrthare-abraahaamisahaakku
Yaakkobennivar than-madiyil paarppikka
